assumptions_made.focus_user_flow: Game Master controlling mobs within Foundry VTT combat encounters.
assumptions_made.end_to_end_scope: Group minions into a mob, pick a strategy, select a target, and execute coordinated actions in combat.
assumptions_made.environment: Foundry Virtual Tabletop; actions operate on tokens/actors inside Foundry.

decisions_made.drill_down_approach: Flow-first on mob lifecycle: select minions -> create mob -> choose strategy -> pick target -> execute action.
decisions_made.flow_scope_and_granularity: Story-level steps for GM commands (create mob, choose strategy, target, execute).
decisions_made.constraints: Stay within Foundry VTT APIs; no new external systems or data sources beyond provided context.
decisions_made.story_map_style: Verb-noun stories centered on GM issuing commands to mobs.
decisions_made.data_sources: Use provided input.txt as sole context; no additional reference material noted.
decisions_made.risks: Strategy logic complexity, edge cases in targeting, keeping mob members synchronized on actions.
decisions_made.target_audience: Game Masters needing faster, consistent control over multiple minions.
